revision.text:
;New to this wiki? *Before you do ''anything'', read through '''[[MGW:RS|this wiki's rules and guidelines]]'''. Do not forget to follow them! *Find out more about this wiki on the '''[[Project:About]]''' page. *If you are new to wikis in general, check out the '''[[W:Fandom University|Fandom University]]'''!
;Adding content *This wiki has three lists of articles that need help, called <u>[[:Category:Article stubs|article stubs]]</u>, <u>[[:Category:Article epic stubs|article epic stubs]]</u> and <u>[[:Category:Articles in need of cleanup|articles in need of cleanup]]</u>. Don't be shy, get in there! *You can find a list of useful templates <u>[[:Category:Templates|here]]</u>, with some of them being documented on the '''[[Project:Templates|templates project page]]'''.
; Talk and more... *Check out the '''[[Project:Community Portal|community portal]]''' to see what the community is working on, to give feedback or just to say hi. *If you ever need any help after reading ''all'' of this, ask [[Forum:Help desk|here]]!
To write a new article, just enter the title in the box below.
<createbox> width=30 break=center buttonlabel=Create new article </createbox>
revision.comment: Created page with ";New to this wiki? *Before you do ''anything'', read through '''[[MGW:RS|this wiki's rules and guidelines]]'''. Do not forget to follow them! *Find out more about this wiki on..."
